level.text: Application shall be made on the form furnished by the Mayor, and may be mailed to the Secretary of the District of Columbia.
Each application shall be supported by letters of endorsement from three (3) or more responsible references.
Each candidate shall be given an opportunity, by means of an oral examination, to show that he or she has the required knowledge of the powers, duties, and liabilities of notaries public.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: §§ 1.2 and 1.3 of Regulation No. 73-13, approved May 24, 1973, 19 DCR 1147, 1148 (June 11, 1973), 25 DCRR §§ 1.2 and 1.3.
